files.help:
Export the following environment variable:

```bash
export SBT_OPTS="\
-Dsbt.global.base=${XDG_DATA_HOME}/sbt/1.0 \
-Dsbt.boot.directory=${XDG_CACHE_HOME}/sbt/boot \
-Dsbt.repository.config=${XDG_CACHE_HOME}/sbt/repositories \
-Dsbt.ivy.home=${XDG_CACHE_HOME}/ivy2"
```

See https://github.com/sbt/sbt/issues/3681 for more information.

See https://github.com/sbt/sbt/issues/3681 for more information.
